tiled.view

Interface MapRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrthogonalRenderer

    public interface MapRenderer
    An interface defining methods to render a map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Dimension getMapSize()
      Calculates the dimensions of the map this renderer applies to.
      void paintTileLayer(java.awt.Graphics2D g, TileLayer layer)
      Paints the given tile layer, taking into account the clip rect of the given graphics context.

    • Method Detail

      • getMapSize

        java.awt.Dimension getMapSize()
        Calculates the dimensions of the map this renderer applies to.
        Returns:
        the dimensions of the given map in pixels

      • paintTileLayer

        void paintTileLayer(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                  TileLayer layer)
        Paints the given tile layer, taking into account the clip rect of the given graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context to paint to
        layer - the layer to paint
